name: Clan
description:
Combat Start:
Once per round, Clans rapidly heal and gain bonus Hit Speed at 50% HP

effects.effect: +30% of max HP and Hit Speed
+60% of max HP and Hit Speed for Clans, +30% for the team

name: Noble
description:
Combat Start:
Frontline Troops take less Damage while backline Troops gain bonus Damage

name: Goblin
description:
Combat Start:
You'll get an extra random Goblin for free next round

effects.effect: +60% chance of gaining a 3 or 4-Elixir Goblin

name: Undead
description:
Combat Start:
When battle starts, the enemy with the highest HP is cursed. If Undead defeat the cursed enemy, they gain +20% Damage.

effects.effect: Curse 1 enemy, reduce max HP by 25%
Curse 2 enemies, reduce max HP by 50%

name: Ace
description:
Combat Start:
Highest Merge Level Troop is Captain. When the Captain defeats enemy Troops, your team gains +20% Hit Speed (4s)

effects.effect: Captain gains 60% bonus Damage and gains +30% HP of Damage dealt

name: Brawler
description:
Combat Start:
Brawlers gain bonus max HP

name: Ranger
description:
Combat Start:
Rangers gain Hit Speed per attack, stacking up to 15x

name: Assassin
description:
Combat Start:
Assassins will leap to the enemy's backline Troops

name: Thrower
description:
Combat Start:
Throwers gain +1 attack range and deal more damage to distant targets.

name: Juggernaut
description:
Combat Start:
Troops behind Juggernauts gain an 8s Shield

name: Avenger
description:
Combat Start:
Avengers gain bonus Damage, with the last woman standing gaining double Damage
